episodes.title: Universal Predator - Esther Rockett reads the first 2 chapters of her memoir
episodes.description:
Esther Rockett reads the first two chapters of her memoir 'Universal Predator: A Lone Woman's Fight To Expose Serge Benhayon and his Universal Medicine Cult - The Inside Story'.

Available now in paperback and eBook worldwide from Amazon, Kobo, Apple Books and more. Visit https://books2read.com/universal-predator to find your preferred retailer or ask for it at your local bookstore. 

'Universal Predator' is the incredible true story of Esther's campaign to expose Serge Benhayon, the multimillionaire leader of Universal Medicine — a female-focused 'esoteric healing' enterprise marketing dubious services like Esoteric Breast Massage.
 
Esther recounts her creepy first encounters with the former tennis coach and self-styled guru that lead her to investigate and blog about his operations. Her efforts to uncover his lucrative industry of exploitation bring fierce retaliation from his fanatical followers — devotee doctors and lawyers among them — who go all out to shut her down. 

When Benhayon sues her for defamation, she struggles with scarce resources to get her defence to trial.

Told in Esther's inimitably incisive style, Universal Predator is a David and Goliath tale for the internet age: a true account of one woman's battle against a patriarchal money-raking cult. A post-New Age MeToo story, it's also a riveting courtroom drama. 

No one can predict what will happen when the slippery manipulator enters the witness box in the Supreme Court of New South Wales and faces questions from Esther’s veteran criminal and defamation lawyer Tom Molomby SC.

episodes.title: Defamation in Australia with Esther Rockett - Part 1 - the law
episodes.description:
Don't get sued for defamation!

Esther Rockett is not a lawyer. She is the successful defendant of defamation cases brought against her by cult leader Serge Benhayon and associates. It was a three year legal battle and for over a year of that Esther was not represented by a solicitor.

Publishing controversial material in Australia carries a high risk of litigation, which can come with huge financial consequences. Esther was bankrupted by the proceedings and although she won, she won't be compensated for all of the costs of defending her publications.

These talks are not a substitute for advice from a qualified legal professional. Esther recommends Peter O'Brien, Stewart O'Connell and associates at O'Brien Criminal and Civil Solicitors https://obriensolicitors.com.au/

In part one, Esther talks through some of the technical points of Australia's complicated defamation laws. The talk is aimed mostly at publishers and helping them understand the legal process, the things they need to consider before publishing, and how to protect themselves in case they are sued. But it might also be useful to people who believe they've been defamed, and want to understand more about the legal avenues available to them, and the defences available to publishers. 

CHAPTERS 
01:50 Crash course - how to avoid being sued
04:18 Benhayon v Rockett intro 
06:16 Planning for publishing
07:03 Defamation as censorship SLAPP 
08:16 Civil and criminal actions for defamation
10:41 What is defamation? Objectives of defamation law
11:50 What is publication?
13:16 The plaintiff has to be identifiable within the publication
13:56 Most corporations can't sue for defamation. Companies can sue for injurious falsehood
15:36 Defamatory imputations as understood by the ordinary reasonable person
22:16 Damages 
23:17 The risk of making MeToo allegations
24:27 Mitigation of damages & out of court settlements
26:09 Defence of truth  28:00 Civil burden of proof
30:02 Defence of triviality
30:38 Defences of absolute privilege, publication of public documents, fair report of proceedings etc.
32:28 Defence of qualified privilege for provision of certain information (reasonableness)
35:23 Defence of qualified privilege defeated by malice (includes 'wilful blindness')
37:12 Defence of qualified privilege at common law (repy to attack)
37:50 Defence of honest opinion (based on proper material)  41:36 Questions to jury to test honest opinion defence 
44:05 When not to publish - eg. Alan Jones & 2GB ordered to pay aggravated damages for malicious defamation

In PART TWO, Esther talks through six disputes that show how the legal process works and the consequences for failed claims and defences. It illustrates technical points of Australian defamation law discussed in part one.  
Watch part two https://youtu.be/zfUCgg_-BL8

LINKS

Esther's Benhayon v Rockett victory blog
https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/2018/11/18/benhayon-v-rockett-victory-at-last-the-way-forward/ 

Defamation Act 2005 
http://www8.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdb/au/legis/nsw/consol_act/da200599/ 

The Arts Law Centre of Australia has a very good information sheet on defamation law 
https://www.artslaw.com.au/information-sheet/defamation-law/

Blogging & Tweeting Without Getting Sued by Prof. Mark Pearson 
https://journlaw.com/books-by-mark-pearson/blogging-and-tweeting-without-getting-sued/

Do you need a lawyer? Esther recommends Peter O'Brien, Stewart O'Connell and associates at O'Brien Criminal and Civil Solicitors https://obriensolicitors.com.au/

Theme Music - Orchestral Suite #1 in C, BWV1066  Bourée 1 & 2, JS Bach

episodes.title: Defamation in Australia with Esther Rockett - Part 2 - cases
episodes.description:
Don't get sued for defamation!

Esther Rockett is not a lawyer. She is the successful defendant of defamation cases brought against her by cult leader Serge Benhayon and associates. It was a three year legal battle and for over a year of that Esther was not represented by a solicitor and had to fend for herself.

Publishing controversial material in Australia carries a high risk of litigation - which can come with huge financial consequences. 

In part two, Esther talks through six cases or disputes that show how the legal process works and the consequences for failed claims and defences. It illustrates technical points of Australian defamation law discussed in part one. 

CHAPTERS 
02:35 Twitter defamation of teacher - $105k award of damages
06:10 Milne v Ell - Shire Councillor v Property Developer - failed defence of honest opinion
12:54 Email about mailbox dispute - $120k award of damages including aggravated damages [SEE BELOW FOR APPEAL UPDATE]
22:49 Malicious defamation of respected surgeon, contempt of court conviction
29:32 Don Burke - defamatory imputation not conveyed
35:24 Sports scientist Stephen Dank - no award of damages 

In PART ONE Esther talked about some of the critical points of defamation law. 
Watch Part one: https://youtu.be/LHfOXGdOohU

LINKS
Esther's Benhayon v Rockett victory blog
https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/2018/11/18/benhayon-v-rockett-victory-at-last-the-way-forward/ 

Defamation Act 2005 
http://www8.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdb/au/legis/nsw/consol_act/da200599/ 

The Arts Law Centre of Australia has a very good information sheet on defamation law 
https://www.artslaw.com.au/information-sheet/defamation-law/

Do you need a lawyer? Esther recommends Peter O'Brien and associates at O'Brien Criminal and Civil Solicitors https://obriensolicitors.com.au/

Defamation of teacher - $105k award of damages
https://www.caselaw.nsw.gov.au/decision/54a63cd93004de94513db98f

Milne v Ell - Shire Councillor v Property Developer
https://www.caselaw.nsw.gov.au/decision/590c359de4b0e71e17f59593

Email about mailbox dispute - $120k award of damages
https://www.caselaw.nsw.gov.au/decision/5cde5a5ce4b02a5a800c0e97
Overturned on appeal https://www.caselaw.nsw.gov.au/decision/5dc504afe4b0ab0bf6073bfb

Defamation of surgeon, contempt of court convictions
https://www.caselaw.nsw.gov.au/decision/5cc267f8e4b0196eea406764

Don Burke - not credible
https://courts.act.gov.au/__data/assets/pdf_file/0005/1381343/Dent.pdf 

Sports scientist Stephen Dank - no damages
https://www.caselaw.nsw.gov.au/decision/56eb6b82e4b0e71e17f5065c

Theme Music - Brandenburg Concerto #6 Allegro J.S. Bach

episodes.title: Universal Medicine in the NSW Northern Rivers - talk by Esther Rockett
episodes.description:
Esther Rockett's talk in Lismore NSW, Australia, March 2019, on the Universal Medicine cult's impact on the Northern Rivers community. 

Esther gives some background on Universal Medicine. She discusses the way that the cult underhandedly infiltrated the health sector, community organizations, workplaces, and educational establishments, and caused tension and distrust among local residents. She gives some guidelines on the way forward, a management plan for locals that minimizes harm to all involved, and options for legal remedies.

*** Suggested plan for local committees dealing with Universal Medicine ***
* Understand UM in general
* Gather information on local UM identities
* Monitor UM activities in the area
     - events related to UM and its promoters,
     - UM identities participating in community organisations, schools etc.
* Use notification template to notify stakeholders and request that
     - nothing UM related is to be promoted within the organisation in question
     - UM identities make full disclosure of their links to UM and whenever they promote,             endorse or introduce anything or anyone UM related to the organisation.
* Liaise with media to keep UM under scrutiny
* Liaise with public representatives. Ask them what action they propose to take to protect  the community from UM's anti-social behaviours

For more info or to ask questions go to Esther's blog (copy and paste into your browser): https://universalmedicineaccountability.wordpress.com/2019/03/27/universal-medicine-cult-in-the-nsw-northern-rivers/

episodes.title: Unpacking Universal Medicine Episode 5 - Influence & commitment
episodes.description:
Esther Rockett examines Universal Medicine cult followers' fervent commitment to cult leader Serge Benhayon and his Way of the Livingness 'religion' scam. It's partly down to their religious faith but strong group pressures also keep them spending on its services and working unpaid to expand Serge Benhayon's commercial empire.

The excerpt of the news report on UM publishing a former UM student's schizophrenia diagnosis online came from an ABC News Australia report on 2 May 2018 http://www.abc.net.au/news/2018-05-02/doctor-gave-patient-medical-history-to-universal-medicine/9710412

The Universal Medicine cult's Way of the Livingness events give insight into the manipulations of cult leader Serge Benhayon and the workings of his Goonellabah based commercial conglomerate, and his purported occult 'religion'. 
Film series by Esther Rockett

Visit Esther's blogs:
https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/
https://universalmedicineaccountability.wordpress.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Esther-Rockett-legal-defence-1697198000499194/
Twitter @EstherRockett

episodes.description:
Esther Rockett's critical analysis of cult leader Serge Benhayon's supernatural beliefs about detractors and the conflict and shunning he encourages. Detractors are often the concerned friends, family and partners of those who become devoted to his Universal Medicine cult. 

The Universal Medicine cult's Way of the Livingness events give insight into the manipulations of cult leader Serge Benhayon and the workings of his Goonellabah based commercial conglomerate, and his purported occult 'religion'.

episodes.description:
The 'True Sexy' gimmick is used to market the Universal Medicine cult's women's health beliefs and practices, including sleazy Esoteric Breast Massage. The questionable practices are based on confusing and primitive ideas about sex. 

The Universal Medicine cult's Way of the Livingness events give insight into the manipulations of cult leader Serge Benhayon and the workings of his Australian based commercial conglomerate, and his purported occult 'religion'.

episodes.title: Unpacking Serge Benhayon's Esoteric Breast Massage
episodes.description:
In May 2016, Universal Medicine leader, Serge Benhayon defended his Esoteric Breast Massage modality in an online video. Within 36 hours of receiving criticism, the video was removed from the internet, along with several others promoting EBM. 
In 2016 or 2017 the Supreme Court of NSW will examine claims that Benhayon engaged in misleading conduct in the advertising of Esoteric Breast Massage and other Universal Medicine services, as well as made false and harmful healing claims, and engages in predatory and exploitative behaviour. His video footage, along with past advertising and audio recordings of his Esoteric Medicine lectures, will form part of the evidence.
For more info and links: https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/2016/06/07/serge-benhayon-defends-his-scam-esoteric-breast-massage/

episodes.title: Serge Benhayon on supernatural entities that violate women & children
episodes.description:
Universal Medicine publicity boasts its clients have successfully quit drugs and alcohol. The publicity doesn't state that its leader, Serge Benhayon, the source of 'One Unified Truth' that is beyond question, teaches that supernatural entities sexually violate women and children of people who use marijuana and liquor. 

For more on the topic: 
https://estherrockett.com/2016/09/14/universal-medicines-entity-exorcism-swindle/

And see Esther Rockett's YouTube talk on the Universal Medicine occult business model.

episodes.title: Serge Benhayon on the karma of sexual abuse
episodes.description:
Audio recording of leader of Universal Medicine, Serge Benhayon's interpretation of the doctrine of 'karma'. He states that children who are sexually abused deserve it for not being aware of crimes they committed in past lives. It's a view that might be described as idiosyncratic as well as fundamentalist. 

Benhayon offers hands on healings to 'clear the energy' of sexual abuse from the 'chakras'. 

Universal Medicine is a multi-million dollar alternative healing enterprise that does not disclose its occult teachings in publicity. Benhayon founded the company after claiming he heard voices while sitting on the toilet. 

https://universalmedicineaccountability.wordpress.com/
https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/

episodes.title: Unpacking Serge Benhayon - Benhayon's audio lectures analysed
episodes.description:
Excerpts of audio recordings of Serge Benhayon, leader of occult healing enterprise, Universal Medicine,  lecturing on his toilet revelation and his beliefs on healing. According to Benhayon, science and other forms of authoritative knowledge are a conspiracy controlled by his supernatural enemies, Spirit and the Four Lords of Form.

Esther Rockett unpacks the techniques of influence and the teachings that form the basis of Benhayon's multimillion dollar business and his international following of loyal devotees.

For more info on Universal Medicine: https://universalmedicineaccountability.wordpress.com/
https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/

https://twitter.com/EstherRockett

(Pardon the terrible editing on this video and the typos. Still on training wheels in video production, but those wheels fell off for this vid. After finishing the thing I realized the titles weren't the proofread version. But the English is still better than Serge's...)

episodes.title: Serge Benhayon speaks about his mother & death
episodes.description:
Serge Benhayon on audio from an Esoteric Medicine lecture on his disapproval of life saving medicine for his elderly mother. 

Benhayon is the head of Esoteric Healing business, Universal Medicine, based in Goonellabah, NSW, Australia. He is a former tennis coach who did not finish high school. He claims he founded his multimillion dollar organization after hearing voices while sitting on the toilet. 

Benhayon claims disability , disease and misfortune are consequences of failing to live according to his Esoteric Way of the Livingness spiritual path. He also claims improving physical health is a waste of resource , disease is 'cleansing' and death is a healing. He recently received over $1.3M from a cancer patient before her death and in her will. http://www.smh.com.au/nsw/universal-medicines-serge-benhayon-to-inherit-bulk-of-devotees-milliondollar-estate-20151227-glvl7u.html

For more information on Universal Medicine and Serge Benhayon: 
https://universalmedicineaccountability.wordpress.com/
https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/

episodes.title: Serge Benhayon on disability
episodes.description:
Audio recording of Universal Medicine leader, Serge Benhayon teaching his beliefs on disability. 

Universal Medicine is a multimillion-dollar occult healing enterprise based on magical thinking. Benhayon teaches that illness and misfortune are karmic consequences for being ignorant of his 'energetic truth', and failing to adhere to his Way of the Livingness in this and past lives. 

Benhayon claims to have gained his knowledge of the Esoteric 'truth' via voices he first heard while sitting on the toilet. His occult teachings are not disclosed in his organization's extensive publicity. 

For more information: Universal Medicine Accountability https://universalmedicineaccountability.wordpress.com/
Universal Medicine Exposed https://factsaboutuniversalmedicine.wordpress.com/
